com.mockaroo.api.interfaces

Interface IValidatorHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockarooValidatorHelper

    public interface IValidatorHelper
    Interface that provide base methods to validator helper

    12/July/2014
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Dennis Hernández Vargas
